name: Hiragana Hero
storyline: Keen Reflex, an online streamer who teaches viewers Japanese with his experience as a professional Japanese translator and with his JLPT N1 Japanese fluency, has gotten whisked away to a magical land filled with creatures called hiragana that can only be defeated by shouting their name. Since arriving in this new world, Keen seems to have mysteriously forgotten how to read hiragana and only YOU can help him by guiding him through puzzles and hoards of hiragana, leveling up Keen's stats and your reading comprehension along the way!
summary:
Learn to read, recognize, and use hiragana as you guide Keen Reflex through a 50-floor labyrinth in an addictive and educational dungeon crawler RPG.
Learning to read [i]hiragana is the first step in your Japanese learning journey and it's the first hurdle that learners struggle to get over.
This addictive RPG dungeon crawler will have you reading Japanese in record time and cut out all that boring study.
